properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 9:43AM EST until January 5 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt. Waves 2 to 5 ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA,
Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA and
Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST SUNDAY
